00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_FILE/simbio_file_upload.inc.php';
00033 
00034 // privileges checking
00035 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('membership', 'r');
00036 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('membership', 'w');
00037 
00038 if (!$can_read) {
00039     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00040 }
00041 
00042 // max chars in line for file operations
00043 $max_chars = 4096;
00044 
00045 if (isset($_POST['doImport'])) {
00046     // check for form validity
00047     if (!$_FILES['importFile']['name']) {
00048         utility::jsAlert(__('Please select the file to import!'));
00049         exit();
00050     } else if (empty($_POST['fieldSep']) OR empty($_POST['fieldEnc'])) {
00051         utility::jsAlert(__('Required fields (*)  must be filled correctly!'));
00052         exit();
00053     } else {
00054         // set PHP time limit
00055         set_time_limit(7200);
00056         // set ob implicit flush
00057         ob_implicit_flush();
00058         // create upload object
00059         $upload = new simbio_file_upload();
00060         // get system temporary directory location
00061         $temp_dir = sys_get_temp_dir();
00062         // set max size
00063         $max_size = $sysconf['max_upload']*1024;
00064         $upload->setAllowableFormat(array('.csv'));
00065         $upload->setMaxSize($max_size);
00066         $upload->setUploadDir($temp_dir);
00067         $upload_status = $upload->doUpload('importFile');
00068         if ($upload_status != UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00069             utility::jsAlert(__('Upload failed! File type not allowed or the size is more than').' '.($sysconf['max_upload']/1024).' MB'); //mfc
00070             exit();
00071         }
00072         // uploaded file path
00073         $uploaded_file = $temp_dir.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$_FILES['importFile']['name'];
00074         $row_count = 0;
00075         // check for import setting
00076         $record_num = intval($_POST['recordNum']);
00077         $field_enc = trim($_POST['fieldEnc']);
00078         $field_sep = trim($_POST['fieldSep']);
00079         $record_offset = intval($_POST['recordOffset']);
00080         $record_offset = $record_offset-1;
00081         // get current datetime
00082         $curr_datetime = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00083         $curr_datetime = '\''.$curr_datetime.'\'';
00084         // foreign key id cache
00085         $mtype_id_cache = array();
00086         // read file line by line
00087         $inserted_row = 0;
00088         $file = fopen($uploaded_file, 'r');
00089         while (!feof($file)) {
00090             // record count
00091             if ($record_num > 0 AND $row_count == $record_num) {
00092                 break;
00093             }
00094             // go to offset
00095             if ($row_count < $record_offset) {
00096                 // pass and continue to next loop
00097                 $row = fgets($file, $max_chars);
00098                 $row_count++;
00099                 continue;
00100             } else {
00101                 // get an array of field
00102                 $field = fgetcsv($file, $max_chars, $field_sep, $field_enc);
00103                 if ($field) {
00104                     // strip escape chars from all fields
00105                     foreach ($field as $idx => $value) {
00106                         $field[$idx] = str_replace('\\', '', trim($value));
00107                         $field[$idx] = $dbs->escape_string($field[$idx]);
00108                     }
00109                     // strip leading field encloser if any
00110                     $member_id = preg_replace('@^\\\s*'.$field_enc.'@i', '', $field[0]);
00111                     $member_id = '\''.$member_id.'\'';
00112                     $member_name = '\''.$field[1].'\'';
00113                     $gender = $field[2];
00114                     $member_type_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_member_type', 'member_type_id', 'member_type_name', $field[3], $mtype_id_cache);
00115                     $member_email = $field[4]?'\''.$field[4].'\'':'NULL';
00116                     $member_address = $field[5]?'\''.$field[5].'\'':'NULL';
00117                     $postal_code = $field[6]?'\''.$field[6].'\'':'NULL';
00118                     $inst_name = $field[7]?'\''.$field[7].'\'':'NULL';
00119                     $is_new = $field[8]?$field[8]:'0';
00120                     $member_image = $field[9]?'\''.$field[9].'\'':'NULL';
00121                     $pin = $field[10]?'\''.$field[10].'\'':'NULL';
00122                     $member_phone = $field[11]?'\''.$field[11].'\'':'NULL';
00123                     $member_fax = $field[12]?'\''.$field[12].'\'':'NULL';
00124                     $member_since_date = '\''.$field[13].'\'';
00125                     $register_date = '\''.$field[14].'\'';
00126                     $expire_date = '\''.$field[15].'\'';
00127                     $member_notes = preg_replace('@\\\s*'.$field_enc.'$@i', '', $field[16]);
00128                     $member_notes = $member_notes?'\''.$member_notes.'\'':'NULL';
00129                     // sql insert string
00130                     $sql_str = "INSERT IGNORE INTO member
00131                         (member_id, member_name, gender,
00132                         member_type_id, member_email, member_address, postal_code,
00133                         inst_name, is_new, member_image, pin, member_phone,
00134                         member_fax, member_since_date, register_date,
00135                         expire_date, member_notes,
00136                         input_date, last_update)
00137                             VALUES ($member_id, $member_name, $gender,
00138                             $member_type_id, $member_email, $member_address, $postal_code,
00139                             $inst_name, $is_new,
00140                             $member_image, $pin, $member_phone,
00141                             $member_fax, $member_since_date, $register_date,
00142                             $expire_date, $member_notes,
00143                             $curr_datetime, $curr_datetime)";
00144                     // send query
00145                     @$dbs->query($sql_str);
00146                     if (!$dbs->error) {
00147                         $inserted_row++;
00148                     } else {
00149                         echo $sql_str.'<br />';
00150                         echo $dbs->error.'<hr />';
00151                     }
00152                 }
00153                 $row_count++;
00154             }
00155         }
00156         // close file handle
00157         fclose($file);
00158         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'membership', 'Importing '.$inserted_row.' members data from file : '.$_FILES['importFile']['name']);
00159         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00160         echo 'parent.$(\'importInfo\').update(\'<strong>'.$inserted_row.'</strong> '.__('records inserted successfully to members database, from record').' <strong>'.$_POST['recordOffset'].'</strong>\');'."\n"; //mfc
00161         echo 'parent.$(\'importInfo\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00162         echo '</script>';
00163         exit();
00164     }
00165 }
00166

00169 <div class="menuBoxInner importIcon">
00170     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Import Data')).'<hr />'.__('Import for members data from CSV file'); ?>
00171 </div>
00172 </fieldset>
00173 <div id="importInfo" class="infoBox" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div><div id="importError" class="errorBox" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div>

00176 // create new instance
00177 $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'', 'post');
00178 $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="doImport" value="'.__('Import Now').'" class="button"';
00179 
00180 // form table attributes
00181 $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00182 $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00183 $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00184 
00185 /* Form Element(s) */
00186 // csv files
00187 $str_input = simbio_form_element::textField('file', 'importFile');
00188 $str_input .= ' Maximum '.$sysconf['max_upload'].' KB';
00189 $form->addAnything(__('File To Import').'*', $str_input);
00190 // field separator
00191 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldSep', __('Field Separator').'*', ''.htmlentities(',').'', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00192 //  field enclosed
00193 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldEnc', __('Field Enclosed With').'*', ''.htmlentities('"').'', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00194 // number of records to import
00195 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordNum', __('Number of Records To Export (0 for all records)'), '0', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00196 // records offset
00197 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordOffset', __('Start From Record'), '1', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00198 // output the form
00199 echo $form->printOut();
00200 ?>
